participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and thoughtful, Sarah enjoys engaging in activities that promote well-being and social justice. She is deep-thinking and values her time spent in nature and with animals.
participant_1.background: I love animals. I am a vegan. I volunteer walking dogs twice a week. I have an 18 year old son. I spend time signing a lot of petitions and donate to animal rights groups.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Energetic and creative, Michael is passionate about music and enjoys expressing himself through his band. He has a laid-back attitude and embraces his unique style.
participant_2.background: I am in a rock band. I hate wearing make up. I have really long fingernails. I own a hot pink moped. My favorite color is orange.

content.text: Hello!
Hi!
My name is Sarah.
I'm Michael. Nice to meet you, Sarah.
You too, Michael. What do you do for fun?
I play in a rock band.
That's really cool! What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of rock, punk, and metal.
That sounds awesome! I love rock music.
Me too! Do you play any instruments?
I used to play the piano, but I haven't played in a while.
You should get back into it! It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that.
Good! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write, and watch movies.
Oh, I love movies too! What are some of your favorite movies?
I love all kinds of movies, but I especially love horror movies.
Me too! I love the suspense and the scares.
Me too! I also love the way horror movies can make me think about the world in a different way.
I agree! Horror movies can be really thought-provoking.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go on hikes, go camping, and play video games.
Oh, I love hiking and camping too! I haven't played video games in a while, though.
You should get back into it! There are so many great video games out there.
I might just do that.
Good! I'm glad we have so much in common.
